subSections.title: Glyph origin
Usage notes
subSections.text: This glyph form is considered a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} of {{l|zh|札}} in mainland China but not in Taiwan. <!-- Refer character 3532, https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表 -->

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This glyph form is considered a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} of {{l|zh|⿱[[𥫗]][[㓣]]}} in Taiwan but not in mainland China.

subSections.title: References
subSections.text: * {{R:twedu|B03225-003}} <!-- Note: This reference belongs to Glyph 1, Etymology 2 -->

# {{lb|zh|mainland China|traditional Chinese medicine}} {{zh-used in|目劄|type of [[eye]] related [[illness]]}}. <!-- Refer character 7692, https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表 -->

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Found in the authoritative {{w|Kangxi dictionary}} published during the {{w|Qing dynasty}} in 1716 AD.
